title: MoviePass is using you to ruin the movies
description: MoviePass announced a movie theater subscription plan that seemed too good to be true in 2018. As it turns out, it was. As the service bled cash, subscribers were actually the ones taking the hit, with their subscriptions being swapped, changed, or even revoked entirely. So while MoviePass isnt the movie industrys savior, it could illuminate a path forward for theaters to take control of their own destinies.
